project_descr: Engage civil society, public and business communities to come up with innovative ideas on how to develop, finance and implement climate smart projects

outputs.output_descr:
Climate Smart Urban Development (CSUD)
Using challenge prize approach to actively engage civil society, public and business communities to come up with new and innovative ideas on how to jointly develop, finance and implement these ideas further.

Climate Smart Urban Development Challenge (MoAEP co-financing)
Using challenge prize approach to actively engage civil society, public and business communities to come up with innovative ideas on how to jointly develop, finance and implement new ideas.
